amendment.description: To increase funding for the promoting safe and stable families program.

action.text: Amendment SA 1610 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1610 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 341.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1610.

Amendment SA 1610 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11282-11285, S11294-11295; text: CR S11282) To increase funding for the promoting safe and stable families program.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1610 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 46. Record Vote Number: 341.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1610 proposed by Senator Landrieu to Amendment SA 1542.
